article.title: TYBRIN to Provide Software Engineering Support for Air Force Guided Weapons Systems
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: TYBRIN Corporation and the U.S. Air Force are exercising an option for $52.8 million. The Air Force is exercising option year six for software engineering support of guided weapons systems evaluations, simulations and other services supporting research and development for the principals and customers of the Air Armament Center. Fort Walton Beach, Florida, is the contracting activity.
